pages.text: Generating near Gold, Silver is a symbol of purity.$(br2)Blocks of Silver will damage unholy entities that stand on top of it.$(br2)Any time the term unholy entity is used in this book is equivalent to if the given entity has a weakness to the Smite enchantment.
Silver Ore can be processed in Furnaces and Blast Furnaces.
Silver arrows can be shot just like normal arrows, but they have a built-in Smite effect.
